channel.title: [317]Brotherhood - A PKing Realm - 16 NEW Images
channel.description:
[ul][list][center][size=36pt][b]Brotherhood[/b][/size]
[center]Base(s): [hr] Delta - Demise PKing [/center]
[center][img]http://img806.imageshack.us/img806/9121/41423499.png[/img] [list] [li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About us[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Our Aim[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#different]How we are different[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#What]A.Q's[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#credits]Credits[/iurl][/li] [/list]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] I am very excited about this development. This server is being made with Benjamin1160, I am proud he is learning alot, and he is head of the project. To make a more better server that provides the player POV (Point of View) with no training. Ben decided to make this eco (which I still neglect upon), and his ideas go beyond anyones.
Development Blog:
[/list][/ul] [code] Format:
Name: Date: What you did [detailed]:
Example: Ben December 10th, 2011 Changed the normal whip to the color green for the holidays, will be changed back once holidays are over with.
---
Ben December 11th, 2011 Changed the beastness of lucky cutlass (chance to hit 99) near 20-30% Added a special attack to the toktz-xil-ak [id 6523] and made it d claw spec, still in testing to make it not to op, but still good. BTW I did it myself, ur way didnt work :] Wielding and unwielding and rewielding toktz-xil-ak will still have the spec bar when you rewield :] D claws have been made a tab bit stronger, possible to hit 99 with 2 specs, not one Working on making new claws [for test purposes to see if I can make customs]
Ben December 12th, 2011 Fixed Lucky cutlass [was doing d claw spec] Fixed Swh hammer to only use 50% spec not 100% Added Stats to "jester hat" can now hit 99 with d claw in 1 spec [rare] 2 hits with d claws k0 [often] RARE@ will be introduced as a "update" Ags uped in str Jester hat has Very increased stats, defence stats are drained a lot also [1000]
Ben December 13th, 2011 Fixed Dragon Dagger Fixed other weps and fixed Jester hat More tunning to be done Spec for whip will hit a 0 From now on
Arham December 14th, 2011 Added KDR
Arham December 17th, 2011 Added an epic new jail system and jury/trail system.
Ben December 22th, 2011 Fixed D boots that were wieled in hands not feet x.x you will only logout if you close browser or if you click logout Adding pics look in folder (rsps pics) Not an edit, but when you barrage, you cant fc since you run next to them good thing to have :D Ancient staff to auto cast, or else you cant. [/code] [ul][list]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=about]2.0 - About us[/b][/size] This was all inspired by Ben. Ben played ALOT of servers and saw how successful they were. He decided to make his own, ultimate, that would own all, PKing server! He is/was a addictive PKer in RS, and wants to make a combat system like it. PKing is his life and so it is mine! Since I was the smartest (and only) Java Programming person he knew, he decided, and seemed embarrassed, asking an 11 year old to Program Java. I am now here, making a topic to show our development and cheer us on! This is Ben's 1st server, and my 6th (though they haven't been released 'nor do I plan to).
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=aim]3.0 - Our Aim[/b][/size] Our aim in to bring PKing to its best! Filling the server with the players POV of PKing, OP items, and we are planning to make a minigame/quest named Labritory! We have much more to come soon!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=different]4.0 - How Our Server is Different[/b][/size] Our server has no lag! We (again I am repeating this) filled the server with the players POV of PKing and amazing items that have reasonable side-effects. EX: Lucky Cutlass has a chance to hit 99 with special attack. Our minigames aren't gonna be any typical minigames, they'll be addictive minigames with points and everything!
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=What]5.0 - A.Q (Answered Questions)[/b][/size]
[b]Q. What is "Labratory?"[/b] [u]A. Labratory is a minigame that has a ton of monsters and they will pop out of nowhere in "The Cave of Recreation." The minigame has wide leveled monsters and ARE NOT based on your combat level. They go from 1 - 522. You can even see the NPC Man (Lvl 1) in it! It is very exciting and the difficulty will be rated EXPERT. Labratory is probably the most addictive, chilling, crazy, and fun minigame ever! This idea was from me :).[/u]
[size=2][b][anchor=staff]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
Entertainers:
[b]1[b]
Admin/Admin - Benjamin1160
Coders:
[b]2[/b]
Arham 4/Arham 4 - Arham 4 Admin/Admin - Benjamin1160
Suggestors:
[b]2[/b]
Arham 4/Arham 4 - Arham 4 Admin/Admin - Benjamin1160
Testers:
[b]2[/b]
Arham 4/Arham 4 - Arham 4 Admin/Admin - Benjamin1160
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=credits]7.0 - Credits[/b][/size]
[b]Arham 4:[/b] For making this topic and helping with server. [b]Benjamin1160:[/b] Helping with server! [b]Demise:[/b] For a source that my friend (Benjamin1160) loves! [b]david7147:[/b] For an epic jail system! [b]YOU:[/b] For reading this and hopefully cheering us!
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/940/pic1be.png[/img] [img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/470/pic2cz.png[/img] [img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/6627/pic3fu.png[/img] [img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/1032/96544607.png[/img] [img]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/6618/34749435.png[/img] [img]http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/1628/99629004.png[/img] [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/949/97411825.png[/img] [img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/7231/77220063.png[/img] [img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/7999/21718822.png[/img] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/8536/31846602.png[/img] [img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/172/93577586.png[/img] [img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/738/58607261.png[/img] [img]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/6509/69702584.png[/img] [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/2259/70024394.png[/img] [img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/1162/12546690.png[/img] [img]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/9463/61990538.png[/img] [img]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/276/65699615.png[/img] [img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/6355/24977366.png[/img] [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/8548/38064671.png[/img] [/list][/ul]
